Test Name: PRKAR1A Full Gene Sequencing with Deletion/Duplication
Specimen Type: EDTA whole blood or extracted DNA
Purpose: To obtain accurate and reproducible diagnostic results through full PRKAR1A gene sequencing combined with deletion/duplication analysis.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood or microcentrifuge tube for extracted DNA
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction kit, gene sequencing kit, sequencer (e.g., MiSeq), agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus
